Plot: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.
Writer: Henri-Pierre Roché (novel), François Truffaut (adaptation), Jean Gruault (adaptation)
Actors: Jeanne Moreau, Oskar Werner, Henri Serre, Vanna Urbino
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.
Title: Jules and Jim
